title: Smart Home Hub
description: Build a centralized smart home control system using Arduino to manage lights, temperature, and security sensors

title: Weather Monitoring Station
description: Create a comprehensive weather station that measures temperature, humidity, pressure, and displays data on an LCD

title: NFT Marketplace
description: Develop a decentralized marketplace for creating, buying, and selling NFTs on Ethereum

title: Social Media Sentiment Analyzer
description: Build an NLP model to analyze sentiment in social media posts and generate insights

title: Real-time Task Manager
description: Create a collaborative task management app with real-time updates using React and WebSockets

title: 2D Platformer Game
description: Design and build a 2D platformer game with physics, collectibles, and multiple levels
